[vc_row type=”container” padding_top=”” padding_bottom=”” css=”.vc_custom_1582655658917{padding-top: -5px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ el_class=”remove-margin”][vc_column_text]

C-mount Video Adapters

Accu-Beam® video camera adapters connect C-mount and endoscopic cameras to microscopes and slit lamps.

Our patented design allows for interchangeable lenses to get the preferred magnification, with an optional upgrade for parfocal optical zoom. Interchangeable mounts allow for most cameras to connect to the adapter.

All of our adapters have a Zeiss connection by default, but with Beamsplitter Adapters they can work with most microscopes or slit lamps.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”72076″ img_size=”full” add_caption=”yes” onclick=”link_image”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container” padding_top=”” padding_bottom=”” css=”.vc_custom_1444503683289{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_separator color=”#e2e2e2″ type=”normal” thickness=”1″ up=”” down=”” el_class=”dotted”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container” css=”.vc_custom_1569437782001{padding-top: 50px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1569426816312{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”72808″ img_size=”large” onclick=”custom_link” css_animation=”bottom-to-top” link=”https://www.ttimedical.com/products/video-adapters/universal-video-adapter/” css=”.vc_custom_1574799170054{border-bottom-width: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1586892098901{margin-top: -15px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;}”]

Universal C-mount Video Adapter

The Accu-Beam® Universal Video Adapter has interchangeable lenses and mounts to work with a wide variety of cameras, slit lamps, and microscopes.

View more[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1569428939069{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”72784″ img_size=”large” onclick=”custom_link” css_animation=”bottom-to-top” link=”https://www.ttimedical.com/products/video-adapters/short-video-adapter/” css=”.vc_custom_1574797917389{border-bottom-width: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1586892105983{margin-top: -15px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;}”]

Short C-mount Video Adapter

The Accu-Beam® Short Video Adapter is a compact version of the Universal Video Adapter with factory installed lenses.

View more[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1569428939069{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”72773″ img_size=”large” onclick=”custom_link” css_animation=”bottom-to-top” link=”https://www.ttimedical.com/products/video-adapters/direct-video-adapter/” css=”.vc_custom_1582848693073{border-bottom-width: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1586892112452{margin-top: -15px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;}”]

Direct C-mount Video Adapter

The ACCU-BEAM® Direct Video Adapter is the smallest option we carry to connect a C-mount camera to a beamsplitter.

View more[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1569426816312{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”72734″ img_size=”large” onclick=”custom_link” css_animation=”bottom-to-top” link=”https://www.ttimedical.com/products/video-adapters/zoom-video-adapter/” css=”.vc_custom_1574790906949{border-bottom-width: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1586892118967{margin-top: -15px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;}”]

Zoom C-mount Video Adapter

The ACCU-BEAM® Zoom Video adapter has an upgraded nosepiece for either 40-80mm or 70-140mm zoom. This allows for parfocal optical zoom and a wide range of compatibility.

View more[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1569428939069{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”71882″ img_size=”large” onclick=”custom_link” css_animation=”bottom-to-top” link=”https://www.ttimedical.com/products/video-adapters/endoscope-camera-adapter/” css=”.vc_custom_1569885747522{border-bottom-width: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1572480160834{margin-top: -15px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;}”]

Endoscope Camera Adapter

The ACCU-BEAM® Endoscope Camera Adapter allows for cameras with an endoscope coupler to connect directly to a microscope or split lamp.

View more[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1569426816312{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”72832″ img_size=”large” onclick=”custom_link” css_animation=”bottom-to-top” link=”https://www.ttimedical.com/products/video-adapters/beamsplitters/” css=”.vc_custom_1574808856881{border-bottom-width: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1572473112718{margin-top: -15px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;}”]

Beamsplitters

ACCU-Beam® Dual Port and Single Port Beamsplitters are compatible with slit lamps and microscopes made by Zeiss, Topcon, Marco, Reichert, Haag-Streit, and other manufacturers.

View more[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container” css=”.vc_custom_1569436712252{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1569428939069{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”72906″ img_size=”large” onclick=”custom_link” css_animation=”bottom-to-top” link=”https://www.ttimedical.com/products/video-adapters/beamsplitter-adapters/” css=”.vc_custom_1574870854926{border-bottom-width: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1572480225568{margin-top: -15px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;}”]

Beamsplitter Adapters

ACCU-BEAM® Beamsplitter Adapters can convert almost any beamsplitter to a Zeiss exit port, compatible with all of our products.

View more[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_column][/vc_column]
